meta.name: Ali Alhussein
meta.summary: Focused, quick-learning, responsible, and team player Software Engineer with 3 years of experience in web development, works with high efficiency and quality and delivers awesome results that show great attention to detail.

education.specialization: Faculty of Informatics and Telecommunications Engineering

projects.name: Pinfo
projects.description: A social media application for sharing photos, The user can log in through a Google account and share his photos with other users. The application supports the comment feature on images, and it has the ability to filter by categories and search for images within the application.

accomplishments.name: Graduation Project
accomplishments.description: First place in the graduation projects in my semester with a grade of 95

accomplishments.name: ACM
accomplishments.description: 12th place in the collegiate programming contest ACM - University of Aleppo.
